item.description:
PRINT OUT this SCHEDULE of BANDS and bring your own copy with you.. click here

 

Since it will be impossible to stay together as one large group, we will split up into smaller groups according to common interests on music according to  the schedule.

12:00 Charlie's will be the meetup place to check IN

 

1:00 HONK! Parade in the Main Stage Cross Walk

 

3:45 ELIOT ST TRIANGLE Minor Mishap Marching Band

 

5:00 HALF PRICE APPETIZERS!!!! wtih a Drink purchase. John Harvard's Brew House (33 Dunster Street)- Pitchers of beer (serves approx. 4 people) for an unbelievable for varying price points, depending upon the Beer.  Please tell the waiter that you have a special price with our group BEFORE you order. Please indicate in the comments section of your rsvp if you plan to be seated  J.Harvard's . I need  a head count to reserve the  big long pub table seating....standing room only will be available but SEATS will be for those who have RESEVRED IN ADVANCE!!!

 

 Sunday October 2nd  -The Thirty-Second Annual Oktoberfest and Honk Festival featuring six stages of live entertainment, Over 30 restaurant vendors, hundreds of street vendors selling artworks, jewelry, vintage clothing, neighborhood sidewalk sales, and HONK! Bands from around the country! 

 

Listen to HONK! Promo Video here

 

Rain date will be Sunday October 9th. If you are late....you're on your own in the crowds!! Be on time if you want to see the HONK parade @ 1PM.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be seated at a table having lunch with Meetup Sign
item.name: Oktoberfest in Harvard Sq. & HONK!Festival
